snippet: Some of the most powerful figures in the New York Region, as identified by the Metro reporters of The New York Times.
abstract: New York Times reporters identify some of the most powerful figures in the New York region and explains why they wield political influence and ambition.
lead_paragraph: Some of the most powerful figures in the New York Region, as identified by the Metro reporters of The New York Times.
